title: Erich von Daeniken, Swiss author who popularised ancient‐alien theories, dies at 90
description: Best-selling Swiss author Erich von Daeniken, who built a lucrative career on his argument, rubbished by scientists and archaeologists, that humanity owes much of its development to the intervention of extraterrestrials, has died aged 90. “Chariots of the Gods?”, published in 1968, sold millions of copies with its thesis that advanced aliens had repeatedly visited [...]

title: Discover the Wonders of Guatemala: From Ancient Maya Ruins to Breathtaking Lakes and Hidden Natural Gems-Explore the Unknown And Unique

title: New fossil unearths tiny dinosaur with weaponised hand for stealing eggs
description: The spike-covered hand of Manipulonyx (or “manipulating claw”) turned heads.

title: Erich von Däniken, Swiss writer who spawned alien archaeology, dies at 90
description: Erich von Däniken, the Swiss author whose books on the extraterrestrial origins of ancient civilizations brought him both fame and scorn, has died at age 90. Von Däniken’s representatives announced on his website on Sunday that he had died the...

title: Renewable energy growth and fossil fuel reality this year
description: As countries race to secure energy security, economic competitiveness and climate credibility, a clear divide has emerged between petro-states, whose economies remain anchored in fossil fuels, and electro-states, which are rapidly electrifying their energy systems using renewables. As the world enters 2026, renewables are growing at record speed. But fossil fuels still dominate the global [...]The post Renewable energy growth and fossil fuel reality this year appeared first on Sunday World.
